replies.body: This weeks RGM is Legend of the Poro King. You can keep an eye on Surrender@20 if you want to know what the upcoming RGMs are, they keep a list with dates on the side bar. That's the easiest way I've found to keep track of it.
Ok, since it is Legend of the Poro King do you know when URF is out this year?
It'll be out when it's out. It's probably pretty safe at this point to expect URF 3-4 times a year, but we don't know when.
